video.title: The Lying Game
video.synopsis: A teenage foster child who sets out to find her twin sister, who has mysteriously gone missing from the well-to-do family that adopted her.

episodes.synopsis: Alec is in jail after his arrest for murder, but he still manages to unnerve Emma. Rebecca and Sutton formulate plans for the Mercer family.
episodes.title: The Revengers

episodes.synopsis: Sutton steps up her plans to win back Ethan.
episodes.title: Cheat, Play, Love

episodes.synopsis: Sutton decides she wants her life back in order to spend more time with Ethan, and Laurel asks Jordan out on a very awkward date.
episodes.title: Advantage Sutton

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca uses Sutton to further her agenda, and Emma learns that Sutton may not have told her the whole story about the night her car went in the lake.
episodes.title: A Kiss Before Lying

episodes.synopsis: Laurel begins asking questions about Sutton's radical personality changes and Emma renews her search for her birth mother.
episodes.title: Much Ado About Everything

episodes.synopsis: The school formal creates new opportunities for secrets and lies to be revealed when everyone ends up with the wrong partner. Emma turns to Ethan for help.
episodes.title: Catch Her in the Lie

episodes.synopsis: Emma struggles to make sense of newfound revelations and shifts in her relationships with Ethan and Thayer. Sutton and Rebecca's bond may start to crack.
episodes.title: Regrets Only

episodes.synopsis: Everyone gathers to celebrate the wedding of Dan and Theresa, but the celebration does not go off as planned. Ethan confronts Emma.
episodes.title: Bride and Go Seek

episodes.synopsis: Ethan's confession to Dan threatens their relationship. Sutton gets a phone call that may provide valuable information. Emma's feelings for Thayer are tested.
episodes.title: The Grave Truth

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, growing suspicions have everyone on edge. Dan gives Ethan an ultimatum with heartbreaking consequences and Emma finally confronts Rebecca.
episodes.title: To Lie For
